name: The Secret Of Hildegards
description: Abigail Hildegard, daughter of the leader of secret order, once she was told that her father disappeared. She should go to the family estate, headquarters of the Order, to find out what happened.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Xp, Vista, Windows 7 Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 240 MB available space

reviews.review_text: have to buy next game for the ending...
Absolutely awful! What was I thinking...
